title: Love Live! School Idol Project: μ's →NEXT LoveLive! 2014 - Endless Parade Encore Animation
original_name: ラブライブ School idol project！μ's→NEXT LoveLive！2014 ～ ENDLESS PARADE ～アンコールアニメーション 0209Ver.
sinopse: Another short bonus included in a Blu-ray/DVD disc of μ's live concert that took place in Saitama Super Arena on February 8th and 9th, 2014.
